features: Gusseted crotch for comfort and freedom of movement
4 oz cotton/nylon stretch poplin - 68% cotton, 28% nylon, 4% elastane

Benett—66% cotton, 31% nylon, 3% elastane, 144 g/m². A lightweight poplin weave with both comfort and function. The cotton helps keep things cool, while the spandex adds a small amount of 2-way stretch. Nylon content keeps the weight down and enhances strength and durability. Water repellent finish.
